understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_code_: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.

config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'includeAndroidLdpiTvdpi' is used to determine whether to include Android LDPI and TVDPI density descriptors in the list of AndroidDensityDescriptors. If the configuration is true, LDPI and TVDPI density descriptors will be added to the list.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered when the 'cbAndroidIncludeLdpiTvdpi' checkbox is selected in the UI. The frequency of triggering depends on the user's selection in the UI.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'includeAndroidLdpiTvdpi' configuration option is that it affects the size of the AndroidDensityDescriptors list. If the configuration is true, additional LDPI and TVDPI density descriptors are added to the list, increasing its size.
